text: Furiosa is an Australian post-apocalyptic action adventure movie. It is directed and co-written by George Miller. The movie stars Anya Taylor-Joy as the main character Furiosa. It serves as both a spin-off and a prequel to 2015's Mad Max: Fury Road. It is the fifth movie in the Mad Max franchise. It focuses on the origins of Furiosa. Chris Hemsworth and Tom Burke co-star. ==Cast== * Anya Taylor-Joy as Imperator Furiosa * Chris Hemsworth as Dr. Dementus * David Collins as Smeg * Tom Burke * Nathan Jones as Rictus Erectus * Angus Sampson as The Organic Mechanic ==Other websites== * Category:2024 action movies Category:2024 adventure movies Category:Australian action movies Category:Australian adventure movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Mad Max movies Category:Movies directed by George Miller Category:Movie spin-offs Category:2020s English-language movies Category:Post-apocalyptic movies
title: Furiosa (movie)
